data.text: @JBToledoman @Zigmanfreud You know what they say. You and John,  takes one to know one.
@thephil1 @Zigmanfreud Sorry moron. The truth is the truth.
@JBToledoman @Zigmanfreud Someone doesn't know how to control their emotions.
@thephil1 @Zigmanfreud You people are so fucking stupid. Enjoy your fucking fairy tale!
@JBToledoman @Zigmanfreud Conservatives don't understand anything if it's not in anecdote.
@thephil1 @Zigmanfreud Sure, because the personal experience of just a handful of people speaks for everyone else. https://t.co/RzTglCUkPO
@JBToledoman @Zigmanfreud I got it and I was vaccinated but my unvaccinated family who are around the same age struggled with it...

@Zigmanfreud You are blinded by bias. The data does not prove your points. You are admitting that Omicron doesn't work with cloth masks, I think. I can't decipher what nonsensical emotional appeal this is. And I'm the moron.

@thephil1 LMAO If you still thought masks work before Omicron you were a moron. To still believe that fairytale AFTER Omicron, you have to be a 100% imbecile. We’ve known for 100 years that masks don’t work on this type of virus & now we finally have 2 years of real-world data to prove it. https://t.co/XMxHvboCbA
@thephil1 @Zigmanfreud And people who did wear masks also got Covid. There’s no correlation between wearing masks and getting Covid. And if you’re young and healthy getting Covid is a nothingburger.
